channel.title: (718) Automatic tokens
channel.description: hey guys, im making a custom dung like minigame its very very simple you just kill the npcs for tokens wich can be spent at a shop, however i want it so when you kill the npcs they dont drop the tokens but it automaticaly gives the tokens to the players inventory. any ideas? thanks ;)

item.title: (718) Automatic tokens
item.dc:creator: @KempiScape KempiScape
item.description:
@KempiScape wrote:

this in player.java

public int dungTokens;

npc.java
senddrop method
if (npc.getId() == DUNGNPCID) {
killer.dungTokens += 1;
}

something like dat but recommend usng array, but this is the simplest way and it works

Read full topic
